Articles.Content:
I've recently installed the Wild Blue Tools, Kerbal Flying Saucers, and Blueshift mods and have accepted the contract "Research Graviolium Preliminary Study at Kerbin".   According to the description, it can be done while on or orbiting Kerbin.  I've apparently completed "Transport the experiment to Kerbin" and "Satisfy all experiment conditions" without knowing that I've done this or how.

I've also accepted "Research Cryogenic Resources Study at Mun"

Can anyone provide some information on how to proceed with this and related experiments.  I'm absolutely lost on how to proceed. 

Thanks much.

This question might get a little more traction in Technical Support, Modded Installs.  Or maybe the documentation of the mod you are using.

Also, welcome to the forums!

1 hour ago, 18Watt said:

This question might get a little more traction in Technical Support, Modded Installs.  Or maybe the documentation of the mod you are using.

Also, welcome to the forums!

Thanks for the welcome!
I've spent a lot of time looking through the forum for information related to this question and it's pretty thin.  There is not a whole lot of documentation relating to the Wild Blue Industries mods.  The .cfg files yield some clues but not a lot.
Got a screenshot of the actual contract, by chance?

3 hours ago, Scarecrow71 said:

Got a screenshot of the actual contract, by chance?

Well dang.  There doesn't appear to be an option to upload a screenshot and since this is the closest that I am to being on any "social" media, options are lacking.  Thanks though. 

Perhaps I should ask on one of the Wild Blue forums and maybe get an answer from Angel-125

@Ooglak Kerman, since this forum doesn't upload images what you can do is use a hosting site like Imgur.com (it's free) and use the link they provide in your posts here. Imgur's BBCode option works best. 

Also, welcome to the forum.
